attributes.action: SAVE CHEQUERS YOUTH FACILITY IN ABERDARE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chequers is due to close at the end of March because funding is not coming through to keep it open. Young people will be back on the street and have no where to go. We would appreciate everyone signing this to show support for our cause!!

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters in the title of your petition; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
